job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: JOB DESCRIPTION Doron Precision Systems, Inc. is a world leader in driving simulation systems and now has an opening for a full-time Software Engineer in Binghamton, New York. REQUIREMENTS Bachelor's degree in Engineering or Computer Science is required. 2-4 years related experience. Design and programming experience with C, C++ (OOP), Microsoft Visual Studio. Software development experience both in a team environment as well as working independently. Significant experience with Windows UI and application development. Experience with Interface Control Requirements and Documentation. Background in real-time simulation and/or game development. Some minimal travel may be required. PREFERRED Working knowledge of vehicle dynamics. Experience interfacing to I/O hardware and real-time control loops. Experience developing and working with distributed network applications JOB DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES Responsible for the research, design and writing of software for Company Products. Supports/installs software applications/systems. Tests new and existing software for faults and corrects any deficiencies. Modifies existing programs by analyzing and identifying areas for modification and improvement.
